languages.text: "Сначала мы подумали, что мон-кай прислуживают величайшему врагу нашего рода, что таится за гранью реальности. Но болезнь мира проявлялась иначе — она искажала Крударах, но избегала встречи с душами наших предков. Мы ждали, когда же губительница душ Сай'лантреш прорвется сквозь зияющие раны мира, но ее взор не был направлен в сторону наших страданий. Никто так и не сумел опознать природу проклятия, что губило наш дом на глазах. И потому, отчаявшись его сохранить, мы бежали прочь".

traits.locale_text: "Сначала мы подумали, что мон-кай прислуживают величайшему врагу нашего рода, что таится за гранью реальности. Но болезнь мира проявлялась иначе — она искажала Крударах, но избегала встречи с душами наших предков. Мы ждали, когда же губительница душ Сай'лантреш прорвется сквозь зияющие раны мира, но ее взор не был направлен в сторону наших страданий. Никто так и не сумел опознать природу поклятия, что губило наш дом на глазах. И потому, отчаявшись его сохранить, мы бежали прочь".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "At first we thought the mon-keigh were in the service of the greatest enemy of our kind, the one who lurks beyond the edge of reality. But the world's affliction manifested itself differently. It distorted Crudarach while avoiding encounters with the souls of our ancestors. We were waiting for Sai'lanthresh, the destroyer of souls, to burst her way in through the gaping wounds of the world, yet her gaze was directed away from our suffering. No one ever managed to identify the nature of the curse even as we watched it destroy our home. And so, having lost all hope of saving it, we fled."
languages.original_text: "Сначала мы подумали, что мон-кай прислуживают величайшему врагу нашего рода, что таится за гранью реальности. Но болезнь мира проявлялась иначе — она искажала Крударах, но избегала встречи с душами наших предков. Мы ждали, когда же губительница душ Сай'лантреш прорвется сквозь зияющие раны мира, но ее взор не был направлен в сторону наших страданий. Никто так и не сумел опознать природу проклятия, что губило наш дом на глазах. И потому, отчаявшись его сохранить, мы бежали прочь".

traits.locale_text: "At first we thought the mon-keigh were in the service of the greatest enemy of our kind, the one who lurks beyond the edge of reality. But the world's affliction manifested itself differently. It distorted Crudarach while avoiding encounters with the souls of our ancestors. We were waiting for Sai'lanthresh, the destroyer of souls, to burst her way in through the gaping wounds of the world, yet her gaze was directed away from our suffering. No one ever managed to identify the nature of the curse even as we watched it destroy our home. And so, despairing of all hope to save it, we fled."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

But the world's affliction manifested itself differently. It distorted Crudarach while avoiding encounters with the souls of our ancestors. We were waiting for Sai'lanthresh, the destroyer of souls, to burst her way in through the gaping wounds of the world, yet her gaze was directed away from our suffering. No one ever managed to identify the nature of the curse even as we watched it destroy our home. And so, having lost all hope of saving it, we fled."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Al principio creímos que los mon-keigh servían a la peor enemiga de nuestra especie, aquella que acecha más allá de los confines de la realidad. Pero el mal que afligía al mundo astronave se manifestó de distinta manera. Deformaba Crudarach, pero dejaba intactas las almas de nuestros ancestros. Esperábamos que Sai'lanthresh, la destructora de almas, irrumpiese a través de las heridas abiertas del mundo, pero su mirada estaba apartada de nuestro sufrimiento. Nadie supo identificar la naturaleza de la maldición mientras contemplábamos impotentes cómo destruía nuestro hogar. Y por eso, habiendo perdido toda esperanza de salvarlo, decidimos huir».
languages.original_text: "At first we thought the mon-keigh were in the service of the greatest enemy of our kind, the one who lurks beyond the edge of reality. But the world's affliction manifested itself differently. It distorted Crudarach while avoiding encounters with the souls of our ancestors. We were waiting for Sai'lanthresh, the destroyer of souls, to burst her way in through the gaping wounds of the world, yet her gaze was directed away from our suffering. No one ever managed to identify the nature of the curse even as we watched it destroy our home. And so, having lost all hope of saving it, we fled."

traits.locale_text: «Al principio creímos que los mon-keigh servían a la peor enemiga de nuestra especie, aquella que acecha más allá de los confines de la realidad. Pero el mal que afligía al mundo astronave se manifestó de distinta manera. Deformaba Crudarach, pero dejaba intactas las almas de nuestros ancestros. Esperábamos que Sai'lanthresh, la destructora de almas, irrumpiese a través de las heridas abiertas del mundo, pero su mirada estaba apartada de nuestro sufrimiento. Nadie supo identificar la naturaleza de la maldición mientras contemplábamos impotentes cómo destruía nuestro hogar. Y por eso, habiendo perdido toda esperanza de salvarlo, decidimos huir».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「当初、我々はモン＝ケイが我が種族にとって最大の敵である、現実の果てに潜む者に仕えていると考えていた。だが惑星の苦悩は別の形で現れた。それは我が父祖の魂との遭遇を避けながら、クルダラを歪めたのだ。我々は魂の破壊者たるセランスレッシュが惑星の大きな傷口から侵入してくるのを待っていたが、彼女の視線は我々の苦しみから遠ざけられていた。呪いが我々の故郷を破壊するのを目の当たりにしても、誰もその正体を突き止めることはできなかった。それで、救いの望みをすべて失った我々は逃げたのだ」
languages.original_text: "At first we thought the mon-keigh were in the service of the greatest enemy of our kind, the one who lurks beyond the edge of reality. But the world's affliction manifested itself differently. It distorted Crudarach while avoiding encounters with the souls of our ancestors. We were waiting for Sai'lanthresh, the destroyer of souls, to burst her way in through the gaping wounds of the world, yet her gaze was directed away from our suffering. No one ever managed to identify the nature of the curse even as we watched it destroy our home. And so, having lost all hope of saving it, we fled."

traits.locale_text: 「当初、我々はモン＝ケイが我が種族にとって最大の敵である、現実の果てに潜む者に仕えていると考えていた。だが惑星の苦悩は別の形で現れた。それは我が父祖の魂との遭遇を避けながら、クルダラを歪めたのだ。我々は魂の破壊者たるセランスレッシュが惑星の大きな傷口から侵入してくるのを待っていたが、彼女の視線は我々の苦しみから遠ざけられていた。呪いが我々の故郷を破壊するのを目の当たりにしても、誰もその正体を突き止めることはできなかった。それで、救いの望みをすべて失った我々は逃げたのだ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “一开始，我们还以为那些猴子侍奉着我们最大的敌人，也就是那个潜伏在现实边缘之外的存在。然而，方舟世界的灾难却以截然不同的方式爆发出来。它扭曲了克鲁达拉赫的形态，切断了我们与先祖灵魂之间的联系。我们一直在等着赛·兰斯雷什，灵魂的毁灭者，等待她从世界的伤口中冲出来，然而她的目光却没有转向我们的痛苦。根本没人能弄清那种诅咒的本质，我们只能眼睁睁地看着它摧毁了我们的家园。当我们确认它没有任何获救的希望之后，我们便四散而逃。”
languages.original_text: "At first we thought the mon-keigh were in the service of the greatest enemy of our kind, the one who lurks beyond the edge of reality. But the world's affliction manifested itself differently. It distorted Crudarach while avoiding encounters with the souls of our ancestors. We were waiting for Sai'lanthresh, the destroyer of souls, to burst her way in through the gaping wounds of the world, yet her gaze was directed away from our suffering. No one ever managed to identify the nature of the curse even as we watched it destroy our home. And so, having lost all hope of saving it, we fled."

traits.locale_text: “一开始，我们还以为那些猴子侍奉着我们最大的敌人，也就是那个潜伏在现实边缘之外的存在。然而，方舟世界的灾难却以截然不同的方式爆发出来。它扭曲了克鲁达拉赫的形态，切断了我们与先祖灵魂之间的联系。我们一直在等着赛·兰斯雷什，灵魂的毁灭者，等待她从世界的伤口中冲出来，然而她的目光却没有转向我们的痛苦。根本没人能弄清那种诅咒的本质，我们只能眼睁睁地看着它摧毁了我们的家园。当我们确认它没有任何获救的希望之后，我们便四散而逃。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Au début, nous pensions que {mf|le|la} mon-keigh était au service de notre plus grand ennemi, celui qui rôde à la frontière de la réalité. Mais l'affliction du monde s'est manifestée différemment. Elle a déformé Crudarach tout en évitant de faire face aux âmes de nos ancêtres. Nous attendions que Sai'lanthresh, la destructrice d'âmes, se fraie un passage par la plaie béante entre les deux mondes. Pourtant, son regard a été détourné de nos souffrances. Personne n'a jamais réussi à identifier la nature de la malédiction, même alors que nous la voyions détruire notre patrie. Alors, sans espoir de la sauver, nous avons pris la fuite. »
languages.original_text: "At first we thought the mon-keigh were in the service of the greatest enemy of our kind, the one who lurks beyond the edge of reality. But the world's affliction manifested itself differently. It distorted Crudarach while avoiding encounters with the souls of our ancestors. We were waiting for Sai'lanthresh, the destroyer of souls, to burst her way in through the gaping wounds of the world, yet her gaze was directed away from our suffering. No one ever managed to identify the nature of the curse even as we watched it destroy our home. And so, having lost all hope of saving it, we fled."

traits.locale_text: « Au début, nous pensions que {mf|le|la} mon-keigh était au service de notre plus grand ennemi, celui qui rôde à la frontière de la réalité. Mais l'affliction du monde s'est manifestée différemment. Elle a déformé Crudarach tout en évitant de faire face aux âmes de nos ancêtres. Nous attendions que Sai'lanthresh, la destructrice d'âmes, se fraie un passage par la plaie béante entre les deux mondes. Pourtant, son regard a été détourné de nos souffrances. Personne n'a jamais réussi à identifier la nature de la malédiction, même alors que nous la voyions détruire notre patrie. Alors, sans espoir de la sauver, nous avons pris la fuite. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Zunächst dachten wir, die Chem-Pan-Sey würden im Auftrag unseres größten Feinds handeln, der hinter den Rand der Wirklichkeit lauert. Aber die Krankheit der Welt verhielt sich anders. Sie entstellte Crudarach, kam dabei aber nicht in Kontakt mit den Seelen unserer Ahnen. Wir warteten nur noch darauf, dass Sai'lanthresh, die Zerstörerin der Seelen, durch die klaffenden Wunden der Welt eindringen würde, aber sie hatte unser Leiden nicht im Blick. Niemand war dazu in der Lage, das Wesen des Fluchs auszumachen, selbst als wir erlebten, wie er unsere Heimat dahinraffte. Also flohen wir, nachdem wir jegliche Hoffnung auf Rettung verloren hatten."
languages.original_text: "At first we thought the mon-keigh were in the service of the greatest enemy of our kind, the one who lurks beyond the edge of reality. But the world's affliction manifested itself differently. It distorted Crudarach while avoiding encounters with the souls of our ancestors. We were waiting for Sai'lanthresh, the destroyer of souls, to burst her way in through the gaping wounds of the world, yet her gaze was directed away from our suffering. No one ever managed to identify the nature of the curse even as we watched it destroy our home. And so, having lost all hope of saving it, we fled."

traits.locale_text: "Zunächst dachten wir, die Chem-Pan-Sey würden im Auftrag unseres größten Feinds handeln, der hinter den Rand der Wirklichkeit lauert. Aber die Krankheit der Welt verhielt sich anders. Sie entstellte Crudarach, kam dabei aber nicht in Kontakt mit den Seelen unserer Ahnen. Wir warteten nur noch darauf, dass Sai'lanthresh, die Zerstörerin der Seelen, durch die klaffenden Wunden der Welt eindringen würde, aber sie hatte unser Leiden nicht im Blick. Niemand war dazu in der Lage, das Wesen des Fluchs auszumachen, selbst als wir erlebten, wie er unsere Heimat dahinraffte. Also flohen wir, nachdem wir jegliche Hoffnung auf Rettung verloren hatten."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "İlk başta mon-keighlerin soyumuzun en büyük düşmanıyla, hakikatin hudutlarının ardında pusuya yatanla iş birliğinde olduğunu düşündük. Ancak dünyamızın yaşadığı keder, farklı bir şekilde tezahür etti. Atalarımızın ruhlarıyla yüzleşmekten kaçınarak Crudarach'ı tahrif etti. Ruhların yok edicisi Sai'lanthresh'in dünyamızdaki açık yaralardan fırlayıp gelmesini bekliyorduk. Hâlbuki onun bakışları, çektiğimiz acılardan uzaklara dalmıştı. Yurdumuzu yok edişini seyrederken bile bu lanetin tabiatını tespit etmeyi başaran olmadı. Biz de onu kurtarmaya dair tüm umutlarımızı yitirmiş bir hâlde kaçtık."
languages.original_text: "At first we thought the mon-keigh were in the service of the greatest enemy of our kind, the one who lurks beyond the edge of reality. But the world's affliction manifested itself differently. It distorted Crudarach while avoiding encounters with the souls of our ancestors. We were waiting for Sai'lanthresh, the destroyer of souls, to burst her way in through the gaping wounds of the world, yet her gaze was directed away from our suffering. No one ever managed to identify the nature of the curse even as we watched it destroy our home. And so, having lost all hope of saving it, we fled."

traits.locale_text: "İlk başta mon-keighlerin soyumuzun en büyük düşmanıyla, hakikatin hudutlarının ardında pusuya yatanla iş birliğinde olduğunu düşündük. Ancak dünyamızın yaşadığı keder, kendini farklı bir şekilde ifade etti. Atalarımızın ruhlarıyla yüzleşmekten kaçınarak Crudarach'ı tahrif etti. Ruhların yok edicisi Sai'lanthresh'in dünyamızın açık yaralarından fırlayıp gelmesini bekliyorduk. Hâlbuki onun bakışları, çektiğimiz acılardan uzaklara dalıp gitmişti. Yurdumuzu yok edişini seyrederken bile bu lanetin tabiatını tespit etmeyi başaran olmadı. Biz de onu kurtarmaya dair tüm umutlarımızı yitirmiş bir hâlde kaçtık."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
